pullrequest.title: Add trigger_light example for ContainPlugin tutorial

content.raw:
I think `target_compile_options` sounds like the more correct way to do things, but there is a lot of downstream code doing string concatenation:

~~~
set(CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS "${CMAKE_CXX_FLAGS} ${GAZEBO_CXX_FLAGS}")
~~~

In addition to our hosted examples and tutorials, there is [gazebo_ros_pkgs](https://github.com/ros-simulation/gazebo_ros_pkgs/blob/kinetic-devel/gazebo_dev/cmake/gazebo_dev-extras.cmake#L13).

If we fix that, we should have a migration plan.

Also, see pull request #2929
